basic.description: Topics include: arithmetic coding, universal lossless coding, Lempel-Ziv and related dictionary based methods, rate-distortion theory, scalar and vector quantization, predictive and transform coding, applications to speech and image coding.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Data Compression & Source Codi

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: MTHE 474 or MATH 474 and registered in BSCE.
